info.summary:
Maria-Esther Vidal works as a Professor、 Leader in Universidad Simon Bolivar/Scientific Data Management group, TIB Leibniz Centre, and his\her h-index is 22, g-index is 36. His\Her interests are :
 Semantic Web; Ontology; Web Service; Data Model; Query Language;
